mapper.select: select distinct m.id , pid, name, uri, `value`,`type`,icon,sort,create_time from sys_permission m left join sys_role_permission rm on m.id = rm.permission_id left join sys_role_user ur on rm.role_id =ur.role_id where ur.user_id = #{id} and m.type in(0,1) and m.status=1 order by m.sort
